t: Derby Laces CORE Narrow 6mm Waxed Lace for Figure Skates, Roller Skates, Boots, and Regular Shoes : Amazon.com.au: Clothing, Shoes & Accessories
s: I’ve been using DERBY LACES brand for years for my Antiks for derby. They are THE BEST laces for skates. I have regular width fuchsia laces in one Lolly and then the more narrow Derby Laces Core in the other Lolly. These are 96” length and my skates are a size 4.
